description: This file is an ESLint configuration script that sets up linting rules and plugins for a JavaScript project environment, including compatibility for different ECMAScript versions and style guidelines via Prettier.

methods.name: FlatCompat
methods.description: A constructor from '@eslint/eslintrc' used to help with extending ESLint configurations compatibly across different environments.

methods.name: compat.extends
methods.description: Method to extend existing ESLint configurations with specified presets.

calls: new FlatCompat({ baseDirectory: __dirname, recommendedConfig: js.configs.recommended, allConfig: js.configs.all })
